pages.text: $(li)The Crimson Forest is a vibrant red biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)You can find Crimson trees, $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/shroomlight)Shroomlights$(/l), Crimson Roots and Crimson Fungus here.

$(li)Some creatures such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/shroomloin)Shroomloins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/hoglin)Hoglins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquitos$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/warped_toad)Warped Toads$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Crimson Forest$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
